column4: Any easy to install ones in Synaptic that you recommend? Firewall hassle?
transmission goes through port 80 so no port forward or firewall hassle at all
ok, will try an apt-get
not sure about gnash--but flash is working once again--should be in a mirror near you soon
yesh!
I installed restricted and gnash... easy to purge/remove?
sooper sekrit partnership with ubuntu (sshhh!)

anyone: Looked at themes, but... lots of them and some require installing other stuff... Can you recommend a stylish theme (doesn't HAVE to be OSX) using smaller icons, Tango seems nice, that is easy to install?
for compiz, or just generally?
there are tons at gnome look dot org (com?)
That's exactly my problem... it great! But I'm pretty new to this and I'd like to go on recommendations by seasoned veterans ;)
well this seasoned veteran (ha! one year plus) has kde, so best to ask the gnome people here ;]
#ubuntu-devel perhaps?
Oh. Thought that was for the devs of the distro :)
yeah likely is, my bad ;]
up the ram and yes
you could go minimal install but then all the shiny would be absent
gnumeric does okay in a pinch
I think it's an easy fix - probably alsa or gstreamer weren't properly installed before mmusbaudio... will a reinstall of alsa stuff fix it?
uninstall flash plugin non free and then reinstall if you mean the one for firefox
Yes, although I will install it for Opera as well
